title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-10.22 - Residence of qualified plaintiffs and enrollees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 69-10.22 - Residence of qualified plaintiffs and enrollees

State Regulations
(a) Eligibility for or continued enrollment in the fund is not dependent on the current or past residency of a qualified plaintiff or enrollee. (b) The fund administrator shall advise enrollees to notify the fund administrator of any changes in address within 10 business days from the date of the move in order to prevent delays. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
